page.description: Used to create a repeating section.

discussion.p: *[ui:RepeatingSection]* containers are used to create "Master-Detail" type data structures.

For example, consider a UX component that displays information about an order. The order details (Part Number, Quantity, etc) would be placed inside a *[ui:RepeatingSection]* container, allowing you to display multiple line items for the order details. You can add or delete rows in a repeating section.
